name: Panic Floor!!
description:
------------------------------------Intro------------------------------------

In this demo your objective to reach the next door within a 30 second time limit for each room with a total of 20 rooms.
The demo features a sidescroller platformer with tight controls and somewhat hard  difficulty.

----------------------------------CONTROLS-----------------------------------
K-------------------------Jump
S-------------------------Duck
W------------------------Enter
A-------------------------Left
D------------------------Right

-------------------------------Additional Notes------------------------------

The game is a single exe. so it does not require any installation. However upon start of the game, the game might prompt you to install DirectPlay. By default you can ignore this and the game will run fine. Mind you that you might actually need to install it. The game might start without window focus, please click on the window to activate it.
Do not forget to give any feedback good or bad! I'd really appreciate that.

. . .

----------------------------------Credits-----------------------------------

Art, Code, Design, Sound Effects - by Panic_OK
